about_the_game:
This is an adventure story of traveling to a different world.

At the same time, it's a story of hope in the midst of despair.

The story of two people supporting each other.

Produced by Taiwan Indie Team

The furry adventure visual novel “Return” is coming soon!

Set in the otherworldly world of the Second World, this is the story of a scarred teenager who travels to the world of the Second World and experiences various difficulties, growth, and adventures with the partners he meets. With a rich plot, vivid animations, and a choice system that has a major impact on the story, you will experience a journey filled with sadness, warmth, and emotion.

This is a text adventure game where the plot changes depending on your choices.

After falling into a coma for an unknown reason in the original world, the protagonist has traveled to a very different world, the “Second World”.

Determined to return to the original world, the young man “Wyatt” will adventure together with his magical partner “Night”. With the help of Night's magical ability and knowledge of the Second World, he will find his way back home, and at the same time, reveal the world's deepest unknown secrets.

“Obviously...everyone...runs away when they see me...”

“Why...do you...still want to be close to me?”

Night, a companion hated by the Residents of Second World, wants to be accepted by everyone and live a simple life, but it never works out that way.

Until he accidentally saves the protagonist, Wyatt, who shares the same fate, he never realizes the dark truth behind this seemingly beautiful encounter...

Use magic to solve problems

The secondary protagonist - “Night” is different from ordinary people.

While normal people need a staff to cast spells, Night can cast all kinds of powerful magic with just his own hands, and by doing so, protects the protagonist and helps him find his way back home in the crisis-ridden otherworld.

Weak, yet strong.

The protagonist, Wyatt, is a simple, ordinary man. He doesn't have any special ability, nor does he know any magic.

However, even without any powerful magic, Wyatt is able to be a pillar of support for Night and his companions with his heartwarming words.

Interact with various characters and collect information.

Throughout the adventure, the protagonists will encounter a variety of characters, from scholars who are eager to provide knowledge to assassins who are constantly pursuing them, some of whom will try to stop you, but some of whom will also be your help.

Learn about the characters' pasts

The Second World has been thrown into chaos by the “Village Destruction Incident”. People are in fear and conflicts arise, causing the characters to have sad stories in one way or another.

In the course of the adventure, you will gradually discover their past and explore their memories.

Traveling in an alien world of danger

The main stage of the story is the otherworldly “Second World”, which is in a state of panic due to the village extermination incident, and the society is disintegrating with constant disputes.

The protagonists will take this opportunity to venture into various forces and inquire about information, in order to piece together the full picture of the events of that year.

A story that everyone can enjoy

Return is a text adventure game.

All the game content is based on the plot, there are no complicated puzzles or difficult monsters, and the only thing that will affect the game is your choices. As long as you are willing to open the game and watch the plot, you can have a good playing experience even if you are not good at playing games.

Game Name: Return回歸

Genre: Text Adventure Game (Visual Novel)

Operating System: Windows, Mac, Linux, Android, iOS

Game hours: About 2 to 3 hours or more

Number of Players: 1 person
